name: Dice King Journey
description:
Dice King Journey is a cozy and simple 3D-platformer with difficult controls! 

Help the Dice King in his (not-so) long journey from Dicey Castle to Snowy Mountains! 

This game is made in 48 hours for GMTK GameJam 2022 with a theme "Roll of the Dice".

Features
  • Numbers on the sides of the dice are commands for the Dice King to move in that direction. How do you make him jump? 
  • Remember, opposite sides of the dice is always sums up to 7!
  • Roll through 4 levels, each with a unique theme and challenges.
  • Collect all 111 coins across levels.
Known Issues
  • In browser Timer somehow goes faster. Time is a weird soup!
  • SFX settings in Gameplay Pause window are not working.
Credits

A game by Viktor Titov (https://itch.io/profile/goldsphere), Oleg Ptitsyn (https://itch.io/profile/hongor), Dmitry Kononkov (https://speedwolfy.itch.io/) and Vlad Kononkov (https://itch.io/profile/wastedfox).

Music is written by Vlad Kononkov using BeepBox by John Nesky https://www.beepbox.co/. SFXs are generated via ChipTone by SFBGames https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

All used assets are licensed for free use.

  • Tiles and Decorations is made using Kenney Castle Kit, Kenney Platformer Kit, Kenney Nature Kit, Kenney Graveyard Kit, Kenney Survival Kit, Kenney Fantasy Town Kit from kenney.nl 
  • Background art from https://cartooncoffee.itch.io/sunnycloud  
  • Crown model from https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-crown
  • Coin model from https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/lowpoly-gold-coin-34794c00e9d140f6b86e930fef18b0...
  • Dice texture from https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/classic-6-sided-die-2204fbfe2ab94e1eaa2fad2dc4b6...
